abstract: The F.B.I. is investigating a mysterious $687 million payout by Olympus, which the Japanese company has described as a fee for advice on the takeover of a British company.
snippet: The F.B.I. is investigating a mysterious $687 million payout by Olympus, which the Japanese company has described as a fee for advice on the takeover of a British company.
lead_paragraph: For two decades, a pair of Japanese bankers toiled away in relative anonymity on Wall Street, hopping from firm to firm.

headline.main: 2 Japanese Bankers at Heart of Olympus Fee Inquiry
